flawed_nl_solution:
His water bottle holds 20 ounces which he drinks 3 times a day, 20 x 3 = <<20*3=60>>60 ounces a typical day.
Over 7 days, without spilling anything, Remi drinks 60 ounces x 7 days = <<60*7=240>>240 ounces.
Except Remi spills 8 + 5 ounces of water during the week = <<8+5=13>>13 ounces of water Remi spills.
Total, Remi drinks 240 ounces - 13 ounces of spilled water = <<240-13=227>>227 ounces Remi drank during the week.
